text: The 1973 Algerian Cup Final was the 11th final of the Algerian Cup. The final took place on June 19, 1973, at Stade 5 Juillet 1962 in Algiers with kick-off at 21:00. MC Alger beat USM Alger 4–2 after extra time to win their second Algerian Cup. ==Pre-match== ===Details=== {| style="width:92%;" |- | | |} {| width="100%" |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" |colspan="4"| |- !width="25"| !!width="25"| !!width="200"| !! |- |GK||1 || Abdelkader Ghalem |- |DF||2 || Zeribet |- |DF||3 || Rachid Debah |- |DF||5 || Djamel Keddou |- |DF||4 || Abdelkader Saadi |- |FW||9 || Ahmed Attoui |- |MF||7 || Kamel Berroudji |- |MF||6 || Réda Abdouche |- |FW||10 || Abderrahmane Meziani (c) |- |MF||11 || Mouldi Aïssaoui || || |- |MF||8 || Lyès Abdi |- |colspan=3|Substitutes : |- |||12|| Slimane Imalilèche || || |- |colspan=3|Manager : |- |colspan=4| Ahmed Zitoun |} |valign="top"| |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" align="center" |colspan="4"| |- !width="25"| !!width="25"| !!width="200"| !! |- |GK||1 || Mohamed Ait Mouhoub |- |DF||3 || Sadek Amrous |- |DF||2 || Bouzid Mahyouz |- |FW||10 || Mohamed Aizel || || |- |MF||11 || Aissa Draoui || || |- |MF||7 || Omar Betrouni |- |DF||4 || Anwar Bachta |- |FW||9 || Abdesslem Bousri |- |DF||5 || Abdelwahab Zenir |- |MF||6 || Maloufi |- |MF||8 || Zoubir Bachi (c) |- |colspan=3|Substitutes : |- |MF||13|| Mohammed Azzouz || || |- |GK||12|| Abdennour Kaoua || || |- |colspan=3|Manager : |- |colspan=4| Smaïl Khabatou |} |} {| width=100% style="font-size: 90%" | width=50% valign=top| MATCH OFFICIALS *Assistant referees: ** Medour ** Lahmer *Fourth official: ** MAN OF THE MATCH * Omar Betrouni (MC Alger) | style="width:50%; vertical-align:top;"| MATCH RULES * 90 minutes. * 30 minutes of extra-time if necessary. * Penalty shootout if scores still level. * Seven named substitutes. * Maximum of three substitutions. |} ==References== Cup Algeria Category:Algerian Cup Finals Category:USM Alger matches
title: 1973 Algerian Cup Final
